entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
